selection.name: Selecting Units
selection.desc: Hotkeys relating to modifying unit selection.

selection.cancel.name: Cancel selection
selection.cancel.desc: Un-select all units and cancel building placement.

selection.militaryonly.name: Select military only
selection.militaryonly.desc: Add only military units to the selection.

selection.nonmilitaryonly.name: Select non-military only
selection.nonmilitaryonly.desc: Add only non-military units to the selection.

selection.group.save.0.name: Set Control Group 0
selection.group.save.0.desc: Save current selection as Control Group 0.

selection.group.save.1.desc: Save current selection as Control Group 1.
